title: Josef Novák
text:
Josef Novák (born 29 July 1956) is a retired <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a>.
During his club career, Novák played solely for <a href="Dukla%20Prague">Dukla Prague</a>. He also amassed 12 caps for the Czech national team, scoring 2 goals.
